A magazine can be used as a paperweight. Simply stack a few pages together and place them under your documents to keep them in place.
A magazine can be used as a plant starter. Cut out a few pages and use them as seedlings for your garden.
A magazine can be used as a bookmark. Simply fold a page in half and use it to keep your place in your book.
A magazine can be used as a fan. Fold a few pages together and use them as a makeshift fan to cool yourself down.
